name: TrackingPackage
description:
track ups, fedex,usps and DHL packages.
Windows store app available → https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9PHP0Z68X02N?cid=rapidAPI

api_methods.name: TrackingPackage
api_methods.description: Track UPS, USPS and FedEx packages.

utterances.utterance: Can you check the status of my UPS package with tracking number 1Z999AA10123456784?
I need to know where my FedEx package with tracking number 123456789012 is right now.
Please track the delivery progress of my USPS package using tracking number 9400109699938860242773.
Could you find out the current location of my DHL shipment with tracking number 1234567890?
I’d like to see the latest update for my UPS package with tracking number 1Z12345E0205271688.
What’s the delivery status of my FedEx package with tracking number 999999999999?
Can you provide the tracking details for my USPS package with tracking number 9205590164917312751089?
I need the current status of my DHL package with tracking number 1234567890123456.
Please check the delivery progress for my UPS package with tracking number 1Z12345E1512345676.
Could you track my FedEx shipment with tracking number 123456789012 and let me know its status?
